verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: shares] [ARG1: a Mother 's Day message] [ARG2: with his Twitter followers] , [ARGM-ADV: giving credit to his own mother for his success] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] shares a Mother 's Day message with his Twitter followers , [V: giving] [ARG1: credit] [ARG2: to his own mother] [C-ARG1: for his success] .
